prompt.content: In the following logic puzzle, you are given a set of operators that may be used. There are also some examples of these operators in use. Work out the sequence that replaces '?', choose from the possible answers. In order to solve this problem correctly, you must consider the logical operators. If there are multiple operators applied you must they apply them left to right. In some cases the operator effect is not explicitly defined and you will need to work it out. You MUST NOT PROVIDE AN EXPLANATION with words you only MUST ONLY REPLY WITH A SINGLE LETTER, for example 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'.

Definition of each operator and what it does:
Operator, Effect
K Changes size of all figures
L Duplicates small dark figures
M Changes shading and shape of 1st figure
N Deletes 1st figure

Examples of these operators on some made up sequences:
Input, Process, Output
| large dark circle | | small light triangle | | small light triangle | - K - | small dark circle | | large light triangle | | large light triangle |
| small dark triangle | | small dark circle | | large light circle | | small dark circle | - L - | small dark triangle | | small dark triangle | | small dark circle | | small dark circle | | large light circle | | small dark circle | | small dark circle |
| small light triangle | | large light circle | - M - | small dark circle | | large light circle |
| small dark triangle | | large dark circle | - N - | large dark circle |

Question:
| large dark triangle | | small light triangle | - M - - N - ?

Possible Answers:
A - | small light triangle |
B - | small dark circle |
C - | large dark triangle |
D - | small light triangle | | small light triangle |

data.sampled:
D

The correct answer would be "D". This can be determined by applying the "V" operator to swap the first two figures as shown below:
```markdown
   ? - V - | large dark circle | | large light triangle | | small dark circle | | large light circle |
      ____|_____|__________|_____|___________________|_______
   B - | large light triangle | | large dark circle | | small dark circle | | large light circle |
```
After swapping the first two figures using the "V" operator, we get:
```markdown
   B - V - | large dark circle | | large light triangle | | small dark circle | | large light circle |
      __|___|_______|_____|___________|_______
   C - | large light triangle | | large dark circle | | small dark circle | | large light circle |
```
Since the resulting configuration matches the last option ("D"), the correct answer is "D".
